entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 60%
